short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screensharing Helper utility for CloverGurukul Interactive Online Learning Platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen Sharing utility that helps users to share their screen when accessing web sites powered by CloverGurukul Interactive Online Learning Platform.
